USED_ERROR_CLIPPER_FEW_TIMES_REVIEW: You have used ErrorClipper a few times now. Would you like to leave a review?
USED_ERROR_CLIPPER_EXTENSIVELY_CONTRIBUT: You have used ErrorClipper extensively. Would you like to support its development?
CONGRATS_ERROR_CLIPPER_ACTIVE: Congrats, ErrorClipper is now active - happy clipping!
COPY_ERROR_MESSAGE_CODE_FULL_FILE: Copy Error Message and Full File
ERROR_MESSAGE_CODE_FULL_FILE_COPIED: Error message and code copied to clipboard
NO_ERROR_MESSAGE_FULL_FILE_COPY: No error message or full file to copy.
COPY_ERROR_MESSAGE_CODE_SNIPPET: Copy Error Message and Related Code Snippet
ERROR_MESSAGE_CODE_SNIPPET_COPIED: Error message and code snippet copied to clipboard
NO_ERROR_MESSAGE_SNIPPET_COPY: No error message or snippet to copy.
